experiences.title: Senior ML Engineer
experiences.description: Lead the development of deep learning models for computer vision applications. Managed a team of 4 ML engineers. Improved model accuracy by 30% and reduced inference time by 40%. Implemented MLOps practices and CI/CD pipelines for model deployment.

experiences.title: ML Engineer
experiences.description: Developed and deployed natural language processing models for sentiment analysis and text classification. Created recommendation engines that increased user engagement by 25%. Optimized data pipelines for efficient processing of large datasets.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.description: Designed and implemented machine learning models for predictive analytics. Performed exploratory data analysis and feature engineering to improve model performance. Created data visualizations and dashboards for stakeholders.
